publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4069 Cathy Jamieson: The Draft Community Justice Authorities (Establishment, Constitution and Proceedings) (Scotland) Order 2006—That the Justice 2 Committee recommends that the draft Community Justice Authorities (Establishment, Constitution and Proceedings) (Scotland) Order 2006 be approved. Supported by: Hugh Henry*

S2M-4069 Cathy Jamieson: The Draft Community Justice Authorities (Establishment, Constitution and Proceedings) (Scotland) Order 2006—That the Justice 2 Committee recommends that the draft Community Justice Authorities (Establishment, Constitution and Proceedings) (Scotland) Order 2006 be approved. Supported by: Hugh Henry
